episode_summary: In this episode, Dan Rochon shares insights on mastering communication and connection in real estate through his Teach to Sell system. He emphasizes the importance of setting client expectations and focusing on one strategy at a time to build a consistently profitable business. Dan also discusses his personal journey from overcoming addiction to becoming a successful real estate coach and author.
